faq.title: Frequently asked questions about Facebook Ads reporting

items.question: Does Flipika connect directly to Facebook Ads?
items.answer: Yes. Flipika uses the official Meta Marketing API to access your Facebook Ads data in real time. The connection is secured via OAuth 2.0, without sharing your credentials.

items.question: Which Facebook Ads metrics can I include in my reports?
items.answer: Flipika supports all standard metrics: Impressions, Reach, Clicks, CTR, CPC, Cost, Conversions, CPA, ROAS, Frequency, CPM, and performance by placement (Facebook, Instagram, Audience Network).

items.question: Can I include my ad creatives in the report?
items.answer: Yes. Flipika automatically pulls images and videos from your ads via Business Manager and embeds them in your report to visualize creative performance.

items.question: Is the Facebook Ads report white-label?
items.answer: Absolutely. Add your logo, colors and custom domain. Your clients will see only your agency — no Flipika branding.

items.question: Can I automate monthly Facebook Ads report delivery?
items.answer: Yes. Set up automatic scheduling: daily, weekly or monthly. Flipika generates and sends the report directly to your client without any action on your part.
